About Us

Lean Coffee

We are part of the world wide Lean Coffee movement, learn about the movement here http://leancoffee.org/

We believe practitioners can learn from each and don’t need a lot of structure to enable them to do that. Just meetup and go. There is a very simple format to follow, which we adapt or ignore as we like, to gather ideas for discussion.

We meet every fortnight and share ideas about innovation, lean thinking, entrepreneurship, agile.

Join us through the meetup site here http://www.meetup.com/Lean-Coffee-North-Ryde/

North Ryde

Is located North of the Sydney (Australia) CBD. It’s a long established hub of technology companies, with many large multinationals as well as small technology related offices. It’s a fertile ground for creating a community of lean coffee drinkers.

Come join us!

Looking for the Sydney city lean coffee? Go here: http://sydneyleancoffee.weebly.com/.
